config.title: configuration
config.interleaveModeInfoMessage:
Enabled:
• Press any letter to start fuzzy search (find bookmarks by name)
• Press '/' followed by letters to use shortcuts (e.g., /yt for YouTube)

Disabled:
• Press any letter to start shortcut search
• Press '/' followed by letters to use fuzzy search
config.backupInfo: This will download a ZIP file containing all your bookmarks, pages, categories, settings, and custom themes.
config.backupError: Failed to create backup. Please try again.
config.importInfo:
Select a ZIP file exported from ThinkDashboard to restore your bookmarks, pages, categories, settings, and custom themes. This will replace your current data.

Important: Do not modify or rename any files inside the ZIP backup, as this may cause import errors.
config.importSuccess: Data imported successfully! The page will reload.
config.importError: Failed to import data. Please try again.
config.importInvalidFile: Invalid file. Please select a valid ThinkDashboard backup ZIP file.
config.importConfirmMessage: This will replace all your current bookmarks, pages, categories, settings, and custom themes with the data from the selected file. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
config.deviceSpecificEnabled: Device-specific settings enabled. Settings will now be stored locally.
config.deviceSpecificDisabled: Device-specific settings disabled. Current values will be saved to global settings when you click Save.
config.removePageMessage: Are you sure you want to remove the page "{pageName}"? All bookmarks in this page will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
config.categoryRemoved: Category removed and cleared from bookmarks
config.resetSettingsMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults? This will remove all your bookmarks and categories. This action cannot be undone.
config.removeBookmarkMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this bookmark? This action cannot be undone.
config.removeCategoryMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this category? This action cannot be undone.
config.removeCustomThemeMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this custom theme? This action cannot be undone.
config.hyprModeInfoMessage: HyprMode is designed for when ThinkDashboard is installed as a Progressive Web App (PWA). When enabled, clicking on bookmarks will open them in a new browser tab and then automatically close the PWA window, mimicking the behavior of a traditional app launcher.

colors.title: color customization
colors.resetColorsMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all DEFAULT colors (dark/light) to default values? This action cannot be undone.

others.closingMessage: You can close this window now
